name: The Time Tree (Chilleh)
description:
Ludum Dare 51 Jam Entry by Joel Pillar-Rodgers, Chillehh, and Greg Schrader.

Defeat slugs wanting to eat you and your time tree by controlling your army of Mushrooms to defeat them!

Every 10 Seconds, 3 cards will appear from the power of The Time Tree. Pick 1 and use it to power up your Mushrooms/Hurt those evil slugs!

Controls:

 - WASD to walk.

 - Left click to apply your active effect (bottom right corner to see active effect).

 - Walk over a card to collect it.

How long can you hold back the slug forces?
